text: Krasnoyarsk Krai () is a federal subject (a krai) of Russia, in Siberia. The administrative center is the city of Krasnoyarsk. In 2010, 2,828,187 people lived there. A krai where Chernenko born in 1911. in Bolshaya a Krai. == References == Category:Krais of Russia Category:Siberia
title: Krasnoyarsk Krai
